<span><i aria-label="|" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img"></i><span class="a-declarative" data-action="cr-popup" data-cr-popup='{"width":"580","title":"ReportAbuse","url":"/hz/reviews-render/report-review?ie=UTF8&amp;ref=cm_cr_dp_d_report&amp;csrfT=g2Mz%2BZsFAAyROrQj15mT5Qvhukd6aWW%2Fq1iK%2FFML6G63AAAAAQAAAABigilUcmF3AAAAAPuJFBJP%2B4jBkd8T3F%2BolA%3D%3D&amp;reviewId=R3ML9ETPSJHTFB","height":"380"}' data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-cr-popup" data-csa-c-type="widget"><a class="a-size-base a-link-normal a-color-secondary report-abuse-link a-text-normal" href="/hz/reviews-render/report-review?ie=UTF8&amp;ref=cm_cr_dp_d_report&amp;csrfT=g2Mz%2BZsFAAyROrQj15mT5Qvhukd6aWW%2Fq1iK%2FFML6G63AAAAAQAAAABigilUcmF3AAAAAPuJFBJP%2B4jBkd8T3F%2BolA%3D%3D&amp;reviewId=R3ML9ETPSJHTFB">Segnala un abuso</a></span></span></span>
</div></div></div></div><div class="a-section review aok-relative" data-hook="review" id="R1WO2W9SYVVC8P"><div class="a-row a-spacing-none" id="R1WO2W9SYVVC8P-review-card"><div class="a-section celwidget" id="customer_review-R1WO2W9SYVVC8P"><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini" data-hook="genome-widget"><a class="a-profile" data-a-size="small" href="/gp/profile/amzn1.account.AENAY7XYLROP3GZDJV3UKXOQNLQQ/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_gw_tr?ie=UTF8"><div aria-hidden="true" class="a-profile-avatar-wrapper"><div class="a-profile-avatar"><img class="a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default._CR0,0,1024,1024_SX48_.png" src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif"/><noscript><img src="https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default._CR0,0,1024,1024_SX48_.png"/></noscript></div></div><div class="a-profile-content"><span class="a-profile-name">Giampaolo</span></div></a></div><div class="a-row"><a class="a-link-normal" href="/gp/customer-reviews/R1WO2W9SYVVC8P/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=B07SVZXBMG" title="5,0 su 5 stelle"><i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5 review-rating" data-hook="review-star-rating"><span class="a-icon-alt">5,0 su 5 stelle</span></i></a><span class="a-letter-space"></span><a class="a-size-base a-link-normal review-title a-color-base review-title-content a-text-bold" data-hook="review-title" href="/gp/customer-reviews/R1WO2W9SYVVC8P/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=B07SVZXBMG">
<span>Spettacolare</span>
</a></div><span class="a-size-base a-color-secondary review-date" data-hook="review-date">Recensito in Italia il 29 luglio 2021</span><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini review-data review-format-strip"><a class="a-link-normal" href="/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_avp?nodeId=201930110" rel="noopener" target="_blank"><span class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold" data-hook="avp-badge-linkless">Acquisto verificato</span></a></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small review-data"><span class="a-size-base review-text" data-hook="review-body"><div class="a-expander-collapsed-height a-row a-expander-container a-expander-partial-collapse-container" data-a-expander-collapsed-height="300" data-a-expander-name="review_text_read_more" style="max-height:300px"><div aria-expanded="false" class="a-expander-content reviewText review-text-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content" data-hook="review-collapsed">
<span>Dir la verit questa volta ho fatto l'acquisto leggendo dopo le recensioni del prodotto e devo dire.... per fortuna!!! come le ho lette volevo annullare l'ordine, c'ho anche provato ma oramai era gi in viaggio(sempre per fortuna). Com' arrivato ho controllato tutti i difetti riportati nelle altre recensioni e non ne ho trovato uno. Sar fortunato io? bho solo il tempo mi dar la conferma, per ora tutto perfetto. Riguardo il joystick  uno spettacolo lo uso in genere oer F1, le levette sono interrattive (spettacolo) se perdi aderenza si sente sulla levetta dell'acceleratore lo stesso quando freni. Levetta sterzo uno spettacolo presisa al decimo di mm. Per ora ottimo acquisto vediamo quanto dura con il vecchio 360 ne ho passati di giochi x circa 6 anni speriamo anche con lui.</span>
</div><div class="a-expander-header a-expander-partial-collapse-header"><div class="a-expander-content-fade"></div><a aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Attiva/disattiva testo di revisione completa" class="a-declarative" data-a-expander-toggle='{"allowLinkDefault":true, "expand_prompt":"Leggi di pi", "collapse_prompt":"Leggi meno"}' data-action="a-expander-toggle" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-a-expander-toggle" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-interaction-events="click" data-hook="expand-collapse-read-more-less" href="javascript:void(0)" role="button"><i class="a-icon a-icon-extender-expand"></i><span class="a-expander-prompt">Leggi di pi</span></a></div></div></span></div><div class="a-row review-comments cr-vote-action-bar" data-hook="review-comments"><span class="cr-vote" data-hook="review-voting-widget">
<div class="a-row a-spacing-small"><span class="a-size-base a-color-tertiary cr-vote-text" data-hook="helpful-vote-statement">Una persona l'ha trovato utile</span></div><div class="cr-helpful-button aok-float-left">
<span class="a-button a-button-base"><span class="a-button-inner"><a class="a-button-text" data-hook="vote-helpful-button" href="https://www.amazon.it/ap/signin?openid.return_to=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.it%2Fdp%2FB07SVZXBMG%2Fref%3Dcm_cr_dp_d_vote_lft%3Fie%3DUTF8%26csrfT%3Dgzr7YO40tzeV3hnXJGLJI9n1xeERpJBp%252FRoQc6MMwtsUAAAAAQAAAABigilUcmF3AAAAAPuJFBJP%252B4jBkd8T3F%252BolA%253D%253D%26reviewId%3DR1WO2W9SYVVC8P%23R1WO2W9SYVVC8P&amp;openid.identity=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0%2Fidentifier_select&amp;openid.assoc_handle=itflex&amp;openid.mode=checkid_setup&amp;marketPlaceId=APJ6JRA9NG5V4&amp;language=it&amp;openid.claimed_id=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0%2Fidentifier_select&amp;openid.ns=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0"><div class="cr-helpful-text">
          Utile</div>
</a></span></span></div>
</span><span class="cr-footer-line-height">
<span><i aria-label="|" class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img"></i><span class="a-declarative" data-action="cr-popup" data-cr-popup='{"width":"580","title":"ReportAbuse","url":"/hz/reviews-render/report-review?ie=UTF8&amp;ref=cm_cr_dp_d_report&amp;csrfT=gzr7YO40tzeV3hnXJGLJI9n1xeERpJBp%2FRoQc6MMwtsUAAAAAQAAAABigilUcmF3AAAAAPuJFBJP%2B4jBkd8T3F%2BolA%3D%3D&amp;reviewId=R1WO2W9SYVVC8P","height":"380"}' data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-cr-popup" data-csa-c-type="widget"><a class="a-size-base a-link-normal a-color-secondary report-abuse-link a-text-normal" href="/hz/reviews-render/report-review?ie=UTF8&amp;ref=cm_cr_dp_d_report&amp;csrfT=gzr7YO40tzeV3hnXJGLJI9n1xeERpJBp%2FRoQc6MMwtsUAAAAAQAAAABigilUcmF3AAAAAPuJFBJP%2B4jBkd8T3F%2BolA%3D%3D&amp;reviewId=R1WO2W9SYVVC8P">Segnala un abuso</a></span></span></span>
</div></div></div></div><div class="a-section review aok-relative" data-hook="review" id="R3THQEVQ8GYMKX"><div class="a-row a-spacing-none" id="R3THQEVQ8GYMKX-review-card"><div class="a-section celwidget" id="customer_review-R3THQEVQ8GYMKX"><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini" data-hook="genome-widget"><a class="a-profile" data-a-size="small" href="/gp/profile/amzn1.account.AFHS3BB5SKBX2ZOO3RH4N7QFYIXQ/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_gw_tr?ie=UTF8"><div aria-hidden="true" class="a-profile-avatar-wrapper"><div class="a-profile-avatar"><img class="a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default._CR0,0,1024,1024_SX48_.png" src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif"/><noscript><img src="https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default._CR0,0,1024,1024_SX48_.png"/></noscript></div></div><div class="a-profile-content"><span class="a-profile-name">Daniel Di Porto</span></div></a></div><div class="a-row"><a class="a-link-normal" href="/gp/customer-reviews/R3THQEVQ8GYMKX/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=B07SVZXBMG" title="3,0 su 5 stelle"><i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-3 review-rating" data-hook="review-star-rating"><span class="a-icon-alt">3,0 su 5 stelle</span></i></a><span class="a-letter-space"></span><a class="a-size-base a-link-normal review-title a-color-base review-title-content a-text-bold" data-hook="review-title" href="/gp/customer-reviews/R3THQEVQ8GYMKX/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=B07SVZXBMG">
<span>Da valutare bene come acquisto.</span>
</a></div><span class="a-size-base a-color-secondary review-date" data-hook="review-date">Recensito in Italia il 24 aprile 2022</span><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini review-data review-format-strip"><a class="a-link-normal" href="/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_avp?nodeId=201930110" rel="noopener" target="_blank"><span class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold" data-hook="avp-badge-linkless">Acquisto verificato</span></a></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small review-data"><span class="a-size-base review-text" data-hook="review-body"><div class="a-expander-collapsed-height a-row a-expander-container a-expander-partial-collapse-container" data-a-expander-collapsed-height="300" data-a-expander-name="review_text_read_more" style="max-height:300px"><div aria-expanded="false" class="a-expander-content reviewText review-text-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content" data-hook="review-collapsed">
<span>Allora cominciamo col dire che e' il secondo che cambio, sembra sia una condanna di questi pad prima o poi dopo un anno si rompono.Non sono un giocatore pro ma le mie due ore  sera me la faccio su COD. Qualita dei materiali eccellente nulla da dire anche ben bilanciato, ottimo il grip forse pero se l avessero fatto della dimensione del nuovo pad xbox serie x sarebbe stato di gran lumga meglio. la batteria mi dura per due settimane con una carica. Sinceramente non ho provato altri scuf compatibili ma visto il prezzo e i difetti che potrebbe tirare fuori dopo un lungo utilizzo consiglio di valutare bene l acquisto.</span>
</div><div class="a-expander-header a-expander-partial-collapse-header"><div class="a-expander-content-fade"></div><a aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Attiva/disattiva testo di revisione completa" class="a-declarative" data-a-expander-toggle='{"allowLinkDefault":true, "expand_prompt":"Leggi di pi", "collapse_prompt":"Leggi meno"}' data-action="a-expander-toggle" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-a-expander-toggle" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-interaction-events="click" data-hook="expand-collapse-read-more-less" href="javascript:void(0)" role="button"><i class="a-icon a-icon-extender-expand"></i><span class="a-expander-prompt">Leggi di pi</span></a></div></div></span></div><div class="a-row review-comments cr-vote-action-bar" data-hook="review-comments"><span class="cr-vote" data-hook="review-voting-widget">

<span>Super controller!!!!............solo per pochi mesi</span>
</a></div><span class="a-size-base a-color-secondary review-date" data-hook="review-date">Recensito in Italia il 23 novembre 2020</span><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini review-data review-format-strip"><a class="a-link-normal" href="/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_avp?nodeId=201930110" rel="noopener" target="_blank"><span class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold" data-hook="avp-badge-linkless">Acquisto verificato</span></a></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small review-data"><span class="a-size-base review-text" data-hook="review-body"><div class="a-expander-collapsed-height a-row a-expander-container a-expander-partial-collapse-container" data-a-expander-collapsed-height="300" data-a-expander-name="review_text_read_more" style="max-height:300px"><div aria-expanded="false" class="a-expander-content reviewText review-text-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content" data-hook="review-collapsed">
<span>Sembrava ottimo!!! ma a poca distanza dall'acquisto, si hanno problemi con i pulsanti, non funzionano pi l'anteriore destro RB e quelli aggiuntivi sotto, soprattutto poi, la levetta sx, che non risponde ai comandi, ritarda l'esecuzione verso il comando e dopo il ritardo continua bloccata verso l'ultima direzione data.<br/>Stessi difetti e comunque simili anche nell'acquisto del precedente controller uguale sostituitomi gratuitamente da Amazon...</span>

<div class="a-section global-review-views review-views celwidget" data-hook="global-customer-reviews-widget" id="cm-cr-global-review-list">
<div class="a-section review aok-relative cr-desktop-review-page-0" data-hook="review" id="ROAQ1CO9B23JK"><span class="cr-translated-review-content">
<span class="cr-single-review-loading aok-hidden">
<span class="reviews-loading"></span>
</span>
</span>
<div class="a-row a-spacing-none" id="ROAQ1CO9B23JK-review-card"><div class="a-section celwidget" id="customer_review_foreign-ROAQ1CO9B23JK"><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini" data-hook="genome-widget"><div class="a-profile" data-a-size="small"><div aria-hidden="true" class="a-profile-avatar-wrapper"><div class="a-profile-avatar"><img class="a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default._CR0,0,1024,1024_SX48_.png" src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif"/><noscript><img src="https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default._CR0,0,1024,1024_SX48_.png"/></noscript></div></div><div class="a-profile-content"><span class="a-profile-name">Daro</span></div></div></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-none"><i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-1 review-rating" data-hook="cmps-review-star-rating"><span class="a-icon-alt">1,0 su 5 stelle</span></i><span class="a-letter-space"></span><span class="a-size-base review-title a-color-base review-title-content a-text-bold" data-hook="review-title">
<span class="cr-original-review-content">Mando con importantes problemas en la calidad de las piezas.</span><span class="cr-translated-review-content aok-hidden"></span>
</span></div><span class="a-size-base a-color-secondary review-date" data-hook="review-date">Recensito in Spagna il 21 novembre 2019</span><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini review-data review-format-strip"><a class="a-link-normal" href="/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_avp?nodeId=201930110" rel="noopener" target="_blank"><span class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold" data-hook="avp-badge-linkless">Acquisto verificato</span></a></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small review-data"><span class="a-size-base review-text" data-hook="review-body"><div class="a-expander-collapsed-height a-row a-expander-container a-expander-partial-collapse-container" data-a-expander-collapsed-height="300" data-a-expander-name="review_text_read_more" style="max-height:300px"><div aria-expanded="false" class="a-expander-content reviewText review-text-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content" data-hook="review-collapsed">
<span class="cr-original-review-content">Bueno me ha llegado esta maana el mando , decir que tena el lite 1 y lo he cambiado 2 veces creo que ha sido , la primera porque se me despegaron las gomas de atrs y la segunda porque el stick izquierdo se desplazaba ligeramente el solo hacia abajo/arriba .<br/><br/>Decid comprarme el V2 pensando que todos los problemas estaran solucionados, cual ha sido mi sorpresa que nada ms sacarlo de la caja y ponerme a tocar los botones , el 80% de las veces el botn A se queda enganchado, hablamos de un producto premium de casi 200 euros.<br/><br/>Cual ha sido mi sorpresa que al comentarlo a compaeros y foros a ms gente le esta sucediendo lo mismo.<br/><br/>De verdad que con todos los problemas de calidad que tuvo la primera versin y ahora me llega la segunda versin y nada ms sacarlo de la caja lo tengo que devolver ? En fin espero que el segundo me venga bien y pueda editar la review , pero ahora mismo estoy totalmente decepcionado con la calidad de los materiales.<br/><br/>Actualizacin 2 : me mandaron un mando nuevo,  funcionaba todo muy bien hasta la hora de tener que cargarlo,  la batera no funciona,  no s si soy el to ms desafortunado del mundo o realmente hay serios problemas de calidad,  maana me llega otro reemplazo , ste ya es la ltima oportunidad que le doy.</span><span class="cr-translated-review-content aok-hidden"></span>
</div><div class="a-expander-header a-expander-partial-collapse-header"><div class="a-expander-content-fade"></div><a aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Attiva/disattiva testo di revisione completa" class="a-declarative" data-a-expander-toggle='{"allowLinkDefault":true, "expand_prompt":"Leggi di pi", "collapse_prompt":"Leggi meno"}' data-action="a-expander-toggle" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-a-expander-toggle" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-interaction-events="click" data-hook="expand-collapse-read-more-less" href="javascript:void(0)" role="button"><i class="a-icon a-icon-extender-expand"></i><span class="a-expander-prompt">Leggi di pi</span></a></div></div></span></div><div class="a-popover-preload" id="a-popover-ROAQ1CO9B23JK_gallerySection_main">

<div class="a-section a-spacing-mini cr-review-stars-and-title">
<div class="a-row a-spacing-mini">
<div class="a-profile cr-lightbox-customer-profile" data-a-size="small"><div aria-hidden="true" class="a-profile-avatar-wrapper"><div class="a-profile-avatar"><img class="a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default._CR0,0,1024,1024_SX48_.png" src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif"/><noscript><img src="https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default._CR0,0,1024,1024_SX48_.png"/></noscript></div></div><div class="a-profile-content"><span class="a-profile-name">Daro</span></div></div>
</div>
<i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-1 cr-lightbox-review-rating"><span class="a-icon-alt">1,0 su 5 stelle</span></i>
<span class="a-size-base cr-lightbox-review-title a-text-bold">
                Mando con importantes problemas en la calidad de las piezas.
            </span>
<br/>
<span class="a-size-small a-color-secondary cr-lightbox-review-origin">
                
                    
                    
                        
                            
                            
                                
                                    Recensito in Spagna il 21 novembre 2019
                                
                            
                        
                    
                
            </span>
</div>
<span class="a-size-base cr-lightbox-review-body">
            Bueno me ha llegado esta maana el mando , decir que tena el lite 1 y lo he cambiado 2 veces creo que ha sido , la primera porque se me despegaron las gomas de atrs y la segunda porque el stick izquierdo se desplazaba ligeramente el solo hacia abajo/arriba .<br><br/>Decid comprarme el V2 pensando que todos los problemas estaran solucionados, cual ha sido mi sorpresa que nada ms sacarlo de la caja y ponerme a tocar los botones , el 80% de las veces el botn A se queda enganchado, hablamos de un producto premium de casi 200 euros.<br/><br/>Cual ha sido mi sorpresa que al comentarlo a compaeros y foros a ms gente le esta sucediendo lo mismo.<br/><br/>De verdad que con todos los problemas de calidad que tuvo la primera versin y ahora me llega la segunda versin y nada ms sacarlo de la caja lo tengo que devolver ? En fin espero que el segundo me venga bien y pueda editar la review , pero ahora mismo estoy totalmente decepcionado con la calidad de los materiales.<br/><br/>Actualizacin 2 : me mandaron un mando nuevo,  funcionaba todo muy bien hasta la hora de tener que cargarlo,  la batera no funciona,  no s si soy el to ms desafortunado del mundo o realmente hay serios problemas de calidad,  maana me llega otro reemplazo , ste ya es la ltima oportunidad que le doy.
        </br></span>
<div class="a-section a-spacing-top-base">

                Immagini presenti nella recensione

       });

<span class="cr-original-review-content">Der Controller ist an sich gut.<br/>ABER. Um die Knpfe konfigurieren zu knnen bentigt man auf einem Windows 10 Rechner:<br/>- Die XBOX App<br/>- Die XBOX Zubehr App<br/>- Einen XBOX Authentifizierungsdienst<br/>- Einen XBOX Live Account<br/><br/>Fr ein Produkt welches in einer so gehobenen Preisklasse angeboten wird ist das einfach dreist. Ohne diesen Zwang gbe es eine Top Bewertung, doch leiden ist das so nicht mglich.</span><span class="cr-translated-review-content aok-hidden"></span>

<script type="text/javascript">
    // Only execute if performance object is defined in JS
    if(typeof performance!= "undefined" && typeof performance.getEntries != "undefined") {




        var metaAssetNames = [];
        metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageMetaAssetFixed");
        metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageEverywhereMetaAsset");
        metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageDesktopImageBlockMetaAsset");
        metaAssetNames.push("HardlinesDetailPageMetaAssetFixed");
        metaAssetNames.push("HardlinesDetailPageMetaAssetVariable");
        metaAssetNames.push("VideoGamesDetailPageMetaAsset");
        metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageStorePickupAssets");
        metaAssetNames.push("TradeInInstantSavingsAssets@launcher");
        if(metaAssetNames.length > 0)  {
            for(assetIndex = 0; assetIndex < metaAssetNames.length; assetIndex ++) {
	     var metaAssetName = metaAssetNames[assetIndex];
             var re = new RegExp("\\.css\\?AUIClients/" + metaAssetName); 
             for(i = 0; i < performance.getEntries().length; i++) {	   	
                var dpEntry = performance.getEntries()[i];
		var res = dpEntry.name.match(re);
                if(res && dpEntry.initiatorType  && dpEntry.initiatorType == "link") {
                    var dpmaDuration = dpEntry.duration;
                    ue.count(metaAssetName +".duration", dpmaDuration);
                    if(dpmaDuration < 50) {
                        ue.tag(metaAssetName + "Cached");
                    } else {
                        ue.tag(metaAssetName + "NotCached");
                    }
                    ue.count(metaAssetName + ".startTime", dpEntry.startTime);
                }
	      }
	    }
        }
        else {
                ue.count("DPMANoMetaAsset", 1);
        }

        for(i = 0 ; i < performance.getEntries().length ; i++) {
            var name = performance.getEntries()[i].name ;
            var res = name.match(/\.css\?AUIClients\/AmazonUI/);
	    var initiatorType = performance.getEntries()[i].initiatorType;
            if(res && initiatorType && initiatorType == "link") {
                var duration = performance.getEntries()[i].duration ;
                ue.count("aui.duration", duration);
                ue.count("aui.startTime", performance.getEntries()[i].startTime);
                if(duration < 50) {
                    csmTag = "auiCached";
                }
                else {
                    csmTag = "auiNotCached";
                }

                if(window.ue && ue.tag) {
                    ue.tag(csmTag);
                }
                break;
            }
        }
    }
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">

function prefetchTYPAssets() {
    var imageAssets = new Array();
    var jsCssAssets = new Array();
      imageAssets.push("https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/29/x-locale/common/buy-buttons/review-1-click-order._CB485942272_.gif");
      imageAssets.push("https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/29/x-locale/common/buttons/continue-shopping._CB485948687_.gif");
      imageAssets.push("https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/29/x-locale/common/buy-buttons/thank-you-elbow._CB485935931_.gif");
      imageAssets.push("https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/29/x-locale/communities/social/snwicons_v2._CB478838660_.png");
      imageAssets.push("https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/29/checkout/assets/carrot._CB485936890_.gif");
      imageAssets.push("https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/29/checkout/thank-you-page/assets/yellow-rounded-corner-sprite._CB485933745_.gif");
      imageAssets.push("https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/29/checkout/thank-you-page/assets/white-rounded-corner-sprite._CB485935382_.gif");
      imageAssets.push("https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/29/gno/sprites/nav-sprite-global-1x-hm-dsk-reorg._CB405936745_.png");
      imageAssets.push("https://images-eu.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/29/x-locale/common/transparent-pixel._CB485935026_.gif");

    // pre-fetching image assets
    for (var i=0; i<imageAssets.length; i++) {
       new Image().src = imageAssets[i];
    }
    // pre-fetching css and js assets based on different browser types
    var isIE = /*@cc_on!@*/0;
    var isFireFox = /Firefox/.test(navigator.userAgent);
    if (isIE) {
      for (var i=0; i<jsCssAssets.length; i++) {
        new Image().src = jsCssAssets[i];
      }
    }
    else if (isFireFox) {
      for (var i=0; i<jsCssAssets.length; i++) {
        var o =  document.createElement("object");
        o.data = jsCssAssets[i];
        o.width = o.height = 0;
        document.body.appendChild(o);
      }
    }
}

    var onload = function () {
        setTimeout(prefetchTYPAssets, 2000);
    };
    if (window.addEventListener) {
        window.addEventListener("load", onload);
    } else if (window.attachEvent) { /* for <= IE 8 */
        window.attachEvent("onload", onload);
    }
</script>

<!-- sp:feature:nav-btf -->
<!-- NAVYAAN BTF START -->
<script type="text/javascript">(function ($Nav) {
"use strict";

if (typeof $Nav === 'undefined' || $Nav === null || typeof $Nav.when !== 'function') {
    return;
}

$Nav.when('$', 'data', 'flyout.yourAccount', 'sidepanel.csYourAccount',
          'config')
    .run("BuyitAgain-YourAccount-SidePanel",
    function ($, data, yaFlyout, csYourAccount, config) {
        if (config.disableBuyItAgain) {
            return;
        }
        var render = function (data) {
            if (data.dramResult) {
                var widgetHtml = data.dramResult;
                navbar.sidePanel({
                    flyoutName: 'yourAccount',
                    data: {html: widgetHtml}
                });
            }
        };

        var renderBuyItAgain = function (biaData) {
            if (csYourAccount) {
                csYourAccount.register(render, biaData);
            } else {
                render(biaData);
            }
        };

        yaFlyout.sidePanel.onData(function() {
            if (window.P) {
                P.when('A', 'a-truncate').execute(function(A, truncate) {
                    var truncateElements = A.$('.a-truncate');
                    A.each(truncateElements, function(element) {
                        truncate.get(element).update();
                    });
                    var recommendationsWidget = document.getElementById('bia-hcb-widget');
                    if (recommendationsWidget) { 
                        var navFlyout = recommendationsWidget.parentElement;
                        var navFlyoutPaddingBottom = parseInt(window.getComputedStyle(navFlyout).getPropertyValue('padding-bottom'));
                        var navFlyoutContentHeight = navFlyout.clientHeight - navFlyoutPaddingBottom;
                        while (recommendationsWidget.offsetHeight > navFlyoutContentHeight){
                            var recommendations = recommendationsWidget.querySelectorAll('.biaNavFlyoutFaceout');
                            if (recommendations.length <= 1) {
                                break;
                            }
                            var lastRecommendation = recommendations[recommendations.length - 1];
                            lastRecommendation.parentElement.removeChild(lastRecommendation);
                        }
                    }
               });
            }
        });

    yaFlyout.onRender(function() {
            $.ajax({
                url: '/gp/bia/external/bia-hcb-ajax-handler.html',
                data: { biaHcbRid: '3H4Y6YXWR46WG9CKQQ69' },
                dataType: 'json',
                timeout: 4*1000,
                success: renderBuyItAgain,
                error: function (jqXHR, textStatus, errorThrown) {
                }
            });
        });
    });
})(window.$Nav);</script>
